name: Data Entry Trigger Builder (UBC Version)
description: An External Module that provides an interface to create a DET between a source and destination project. This version is forked from the original version developed by the BC Children's Hospital Research Institute.

authors.name: Ashley Lee
authors.institution: University of British Columbia Faculty of Medicine - Digital Solutions

project-settings.name: Check this field to allow users to download a document which summarizes the current builder settings
